Evaluating Arrhythmias
The impairment and disability resulting from one or more types of arrhythmia, evaluated under
38 CFR 4.104, DCs 7009-7011 and 7015
, are essentially indistinguishable.Â  Consequently, assignment of multiple evaluations under any of these DCs would be in violation of
38 CFR 4.14
.
Assign a single evaluation under the DC which reflects the predominant disability picture for the arrhythmia(s) in question.
